mapper.select: select m.movie_no, m.movie_title, m.movie_thumb, m.movie_grade, m.movie_content, count(c.book_no) gallery_count from movie_tbl m left join price_tbl p on (p.movie_no = m.movie_no) left join book_tbl b on (b.price_no = p.price_no) left join (select bs.book_no from pay_tbl p join book_seat_tbl bs on (bs.book_seat_no = p.book_seat_no)) c on (c.book_no = b.book_no) where (m.movie_status != 3 and to_number(sysdate-b.booking_date) <= 7) or (m.movie_status != 3 and b.booking_date is null) group by m.movie_no,m.movie_title, m.movie_thumb, m.movie_grade, m.movie_content order by gallery_count desc
